title: My Wife Likes it With Peaches
description: Judge Hodgman's chambers have been too rollicking! This episode, we are committed to less rollicking and more justice! We discuss kids' poop talk, abandoned laundry, half finished fruit, wedge salads, dead ends, and a ruling from Merriam-Webster on how many holes there are in a straw.
author: shows@maximumfun.org (John Hodgman, Jesse Thorn)
